DOC.brief_summary: Major depression is characterized by vestibular anomalies. The investigators hypothesized that vestibular stimulation will improve depression symptoms in major depression patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Effectiveness of Vestibular Stimulation as a Coadjuvant Treatment in Major Depression
DOC.criteria: major depression patients, actual Hamilton score > 14 pregnant, neurological disorders, epilepsy, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, anorexia, bulimia.
